alert.note: Alert for Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 22 at 12:08AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Massachusetts, including the following county, Worcester. * WHEN...Until 600 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1204 AM EDT, Minor flooding was occurring along the Ware River in Barre and Barre Plains due to earlier heavy rainfall. Minor flooding is expected to affect low lying areas along the river until daybreak on Saturday. - Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Barre, Hubbardston, Hardwick, Oakham and New Braintree.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
